title: What a pandemic Christmas looked like around the world
description: From masked mass to a socially distanced beach party, here's how Christmas looked in 2020.

title: Covid: Post-exposure antibody protection trialled
description: If it proves effective, the jab could protect vulnerable people who haven't or can't be vaccinated.

title: LadBaby bags third straight Christmas number one
description: The charitable sausage roll singer is now on a par with The Beatles and the Spice Girls.

title: Brexit trade deal: What were the big themes in the talks?
description: Analysis of how the Brexit trade deal will change relations between the UK and the EU for good

title: UK white Christmas declared after overnight snow
description: "We've just had official confirmation that this Christmas is a white one!" the Met Office tweets.

title: Covid: Heroic response praised in religious leaders' Christmas messages
description: The Christmas messages reflect on the impact of the pandemic - and people's responses.

title: Brexit: EU diplomats get trade deal briefing
description: The BBC has seen the 1,246-page document, which includes about 800 pages of annexes and footnotes.

title: UK flooding: Bungay and Wainford homes evacuated and leisure centre shut
description: Police praise residents for "compassion" shown to officers while being told to leave their homes.

title: Christmas: The mail order pioneer who started a billion-pound industry
description: How a 19th Century draper "set up a company similar to Amazon" and created a billion pound industry.

title: Kent lorry chaos: Thousands of lorry drivers spend Christmas in cabs
description: Hundreds of military personnel have been deployed to help clear the backlog of about 5,000 lorries.

title: In pictures: Christmas celebrations around the world
description: This year's services and events are being attended by far fewer people because of the Covid outbreak.

title: Notre-Dame: Choir sings inside cathedral for first time since fire
description: Singers perform inside the Paris cathedral for the first time since the April 2019 fire.

title: 'Despite Covid, why 2020 was the best year of my life'
description: People talk about why their 2020 was one to remember, despite everything.

title: Covid-19: US imposes tests on UK airline passengers
description: The new rule will begin on 28 December amid concerns over the new variant of coronavirus.

title: John Edrich: Former England batsman dies aged 83
description: Former England batsman John Edrich, who scored more than 5,000 runs including 12 centuries in 77 Test matches, dies aged 83.

title: Covid: Queen spends Christmas apart from family
description: The monarch will reflect on the hardships of the pandemic in her Christmas speech at 15:00 GMT.

title: Mam Tor Christmas marriage proposal photographed by chance
description: A marriage proposal is caught by a keen photographer who was walking in the Peak District.

title: Covid-19: Sandringham Royal Family fans left 'disappointed'
description: About 5,000 people usually spend their Christmas morning watching the Royal Family arrive at church - but not this year.

title: Coronavirus: The students who can't go home for Christmas
description: Many students have faced the dilemma this year of whether to spend Christmas with their families.

title: Rob Burrow: Rugby League legend's year living with MND
description: The Rugby League legend looks back on a year of challenges since his motor neurone disease diagnosis.

title: Bridgerton: Everything you need to know about the Netflix drama
description: The period drama, which launches on Christmas Day, is based on the best-selling romance novels.

title: 'White Christmas': The biggest selling single of all time
description: The story of Bing Crosby and 'White Christmas'

title: The best of the cheesy Christmas movies
description: If you are looking for pure festive escapism with a guaranteed happy ending, check these films out.

title: Christmas cards: You won't believe the effort this family goes to!
description: From Game of Thrones to Elf - meet the family whose Christmas cards take months to make.

title: Georgia climbers who risk their lives for Christmas trees
description: In the Republic of Georgia, workers harvest the seeds of Nordmann firs for export to Europe.

title: The refugees feeding a nation
description: How did French Guiana come to rely on its Hmong citizens for food?

title: Brexit deal is 'best Christmas present I could have'
description: Saving thousands or anxious they need more time, six bosses explain how the Brexit deal affects them.

title: A scene in The Pianist changed Arson Fahim's life
description: As a young boy, Fahim saw a piano on screen in a refugee camp. "What I saw captivated me," he said.
